text: Al Mukaynis is a locality of Mebaireek located in the municipality of Ar Rayyan, Qatar. Mudhlem Cave, which translates to "Dark Cave" in Arabic, is located in the area. Nearby Al Rekayya Farms (Irkaya Farms) is a popular bird watching site. In J.G. Lorimer's Gazetteer of the Persian Gulf, Al Mukaynis was mentioned as a stopover on the route from Hofuf to Doha as early as 1908. ==Climate== The following is climate data for Mukenis obtained from Qatar Meteorology Department. ==References== ==External links== * Geography.org Category:Populated places in Al Rayyan
title: Al Mukaynis
